content.text:
# Draft:Battle of Negotino

The Battle of Negotino was a military engagement fought between the Royal Serbian Army, led by Jovan Babunski, and the IMRO, led by Doncho Lazarov and Mihail Shkartov. Due to this battle, the Serbian Army was mostly forced out of the region.
